title: The Seed
description: Researchers from the University of Southampton have calculated the number of human casualties that would result from three different impact a meteor that blows up in the atmosphere (an air burst), a meteorite that hits the ground, and one that splashes into the ocean. In every scenario, most of the deaths were determined to be the result of an intense wind gust causing hurricane-like devastation, rather than from incredible heat, falling rocks, or a wall of intense pressure.- MIKE MCRAE in an excerpt from an article published online atWhen an AI becomes conscious, it brings about the end of the world in a nuclear catastrophe.My name is Ruddra, I am one of many humans who remain, born in the aftermath, clinging onto the hope, that we will reach space before complete annihilation.
author: C Bharg
